alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued October 23 at 4:24PM AKDT until October 25 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...High Surf will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast and Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion may occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds gusting to 40 mph will cause sea levels to rise several feet by tonight. When the winds turn westerly late tonight and Tuesday, waves will push onshore, especially along west facing shores. Utqiagvik will be especially vulnerable to high surf late Monday night and Tuesday, and significant beach erosion is expected at Utqiagvik. The winds will decrease Tuesday night, and surf should decrease early Wednesday.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Northern Arctic Coast; Northwest Arctic Coast
